| Munich (GER) | ONSITE | Fulltime | blik - https://www.blik.io | | Finalist Techcrunch Battlefield (watch video here: https://goo.gl/rSDyXh) | Alumnus of Techstars IoT Accelerator, New York |

* Software Developer - IoT System https://goo.gl/LNwx1m

* Embedded Software Engineer https://goo.gl/zks7N5

* Intern: Frontend Developer https://goo.gl/sbg6kS

* Intern: Data Analyst https://goo.gl/mH9y4f

Our customers range from large OEMs like BMW and Volkswagen to family owned suppliers - We want to make their entire flow of goods of hundreds of thousands of items visible in real time. Our solution combines hard- and software to enable a fully transparent supply-chain around the entire world.

Interested working on a challenging problem? Contact us through talent@blik.io
